short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Extension for Amazon affiliates. Chrome Extension created as Amazon Associate SiteStripe Alternatives

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Amazon SiteStripe Alternative is a Chrome browser extension developed for Amazon Affiliate Marketers. It serves as an alternative to Amazon's SiteStripe tool, allowing Associates to generate affiliate links for any selected product. Although Amazon still provides this tool with text links, it has discontinued the image affiliate links.

This Chrome extension offers the quickest and easiest way to link to any Amazon product, insert your Amazon Tracking ID or Tag ID, and ensure you receive credit for all your referral commissions. You donâ€™t need to be logged into your Amazon Associate account to use this tool. It also doesn't require the Amazon API or other complicated steps.

This extension is so easy to install and use. It is extremely helpful for Amazon associates, content publishers, online marketers and marketing agencies.
